column5: So i was at crappy tire today and i was walking through the ice fishing section they just put out. i saw sitting there was this suffix braided ice line. its was bright orange!! ive been needing some new ice line and just thought i'd get your guys opinion on it. i havent used much braided lines ice fishing always just mono. and the colour is very bright, like does it go clear in the water or should i be adding some flouro to the end of it? the stuff is pretty pricey for the amount you get, dont feel like forking over that much to expirment.
